import React from 'react' import cl from './PizzaPopup.module.scss' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { selectorPopupItem, switchVisible } from '../../redux/slices/popupSlice' import { addItem } from '../../redux/slices/cartSlice' const PizzaPopup: React.FC = () => { const { id, size, name, price, imgUrl, type, count } = useSelector(selectorPopupItem) const dispatch = useDispatch() return (

{name}

Description Description Description Description Description Description Description Description Description
) } export default PizzaPopup
